paragraphs.body: And should we consider to add more details under on "Revert process 3.4 - If agreement cannot be reached, propose your reverted change on the relevant article's comments. For more wide-reaching changes, use the War Room." to add "If agreement cannot be reached, propose your reverted change on the relevant article's comments. For more wide-reaching changes, use the War Room. This includes not to revert some of the users such as Rollback and Admins that closed the forum thread without giving a reason.", I think we should add that to the policy to make sure nobody gets that into trouble?-- King Marth 64 (talk • other wikis • blogs)   05:41, June 30, 2012 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: And should we consider to add more details under on "Revert process 3.4 - If agreement cannot be reached, propose your reverted change on the relevant article's comments. For more wide-reaching changes, use the War Room." to add "If agreement cannot be reached, propose your reverted change on the relevant article's comments. For more wide-reaching changes, use the War Room. This includes not to revert some of the users such as Rollback and Admins that closed the forum thread without giving a reason.", I think we should add that to the policy to make sure nobody gets that into trouble?-- King Marth 64 (talk • other wikis • blogs)   05:41, June 30, 2012 (UTC)
